metadata.Title: CVE-2021-20184 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: It was found in Moodle before version 3.10.1, 3.9.4 and 3.8.7 that a insufficient capability checks in some grade related web services meant students were able to view other students grades.

criterions.comment: moodle: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
